Subject: Re: Product Tags


Hi Jessica,

Thanks for the below updates. We have setup product schema on the site, but yes, this is an SEO component that Neon will fit into their larger strategy.

Google very much so has the final say as to what they load in the search results. All we can do is point them in the right direction and hope for the best.

I will check out the below other items and update you once they are done.

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au

On 15 Sep 2020, at 11:14 am, Jessica Torres | RAM Equipment <jessica.torres@RAMequipment.com.au> wrote:

Hi Heath,

As per Molly's emails regarding the sitelinks, I have gone ahead and updated the meta descriptions.

Do you having anything to do with the schema mark-up to do the sitelinks search box, or is this something Neon will do?

Also and an FYI, I have discovered that the product tags are important, for the sitelinks to show products for hire, buy, category, brand etc. So I have gone ahead an updated those as well but thought to let you know.

The below pages need to be updated:


https://ramequipment.com.au/product/norm-engineering-4-in-1-bucket/ - change to per/day

https://ramequipment.com.au/product/robi-demolition-grapple/ - need to remove POA since we have pricing for these
